question: Assalaamu Alaykum Respected Mufti Saheb Is having a picture of the kaba ,allowed (since it does have people in it). Jazakallah Khair. may Allah reward you for your good work.
answer:
QUESTION
ANSWER


Share:
If the picture is big wherein the head and eyes of people are visible, then
it is not permissible. If the picture is small wherein head and eyes are not
visible, then such a picture of the Ka'bah is permissible.

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
FATWA DEPT.
